name: from Seoul!
greetingText1: Every great product has a story,
greetingText2: and I'm here to help you tell yours.
text1: A website isn't just a collection of pages...
text2: I believe in understanding your brand's essence, its unique voice,
text3: and translating that into an intuitive and captivating digital journey.
textInChatBox: Templates and AI build sites. But do they build *your story*?
text4: Let's weave your vision into a compelling, interactive
outroText: Ready to begin your digital narrative?
